\label{constraint:upper_component_instance_limit} \mathop\forall_{ {c \in \glssymbol{COMPONENTS}}}   \sum_{ {vm \in \glssymbol{ALLOWED_VM_TYPES}[_{c}]}}\glssymbol{use}[_{c,vm}] \le \glssymbol{component_max_instances}[_{c}] \\
\label{constraint:lower_component_instance_limit} \mathop\forall_{ {c \in \glssymbol{COMPONENTS}}}   \sum_{ {vm \in \glssymbol{ALLOWED_VM_TYPES}[_{c}]}}\glssymbol{use}[_{c,vm}] \ge \glssymbol{component_min_instances}[_{c}] \\
\label{constraint:provider_instance_limit} \mathop\forall_{ {p \in \glssymbol{PROVIDERS}}}   \sum_{ {c \in \glssymbol{COMPONENTS}}\atop {{vm \in \glssymbol{ALLOWED_PROVIDER_VM_TYPES}[_{p,c}]}}}\glssymbol{use}[_{c,vm}] \le \glssymbol{provider_max_machines}[_{p}] \\
\label{constraint:sm_is_on_same_provider} \mathop\forall_{ {p \in \glssymbol{PROVIDERS}}}   \sum_{ {vm \in \glssymbol{ALLOWED_PROVIDER_VM_TYPES}[_{p,cIS}]}}\glssymbol{use}[_{cIS,vm}] = \sum_{ {vm \in \glssymbol{ALLOWED_PROVIDER_VM_TYPES}[_{p,cSM}]}}\glssymbol{use}[_{cSM,vm}] \\
\label{constraint:max_workers_per_em_on_provider} \mathop\forall_{ {p \in \glssymbol{PROVIDERS}}}   \glssymbol{max_workers_per_em} \cdot \sum_{ {vm \in \glssymbol{ALLOWED_PROVIDER_VM_TYPES}[_{p,cEM}]}}\glssymbol{use}[_{cEM,vm}] \ge \sum_{ {vm \in \glssymbol{ALLOWED_PROVIDER_VM_TYPES}[_{p,cW}]}}\glssymbol{use}[_{cW,vm}] \\
\label{constraint:max_one_load_balancer_per_provider} \mathop\forall_{ {p \in \glssymbol{PROVIDERS}}}   \sum_{ {vm \in \glssymbol{ALLOWED_PROVIDER_VM_TYPES}[_{p,cLB}]}}\glssymbol{use}[_{cLB,vm}] \le 1 \\
\label{constraint:more_em_than_lb_on_provider} \mathop\forall_{ {p \in \glssymbol{PROVIDERS}}}   \sum_{ {vm \in \glssymbol{ALLOWED_PROVIDER_VM_TYPES}[_{p,cEM}]}}\glssymbol{use}[_{cEM,vm}] \ge 2 \cdot \sum_{ {vm \in \glssymbol{ALLOWED_PROVIDER_VM_TYPES}[_{p,cLB}]}}\glssymbol{use}[_{cLB,vm}] \\
\label{constraint:lb_when_more_than_two_em_on_provider} \mathop\forall_{ {p \in \glssymbol{PROVIDERS}}}   \sum_{ {vm \in \glssymbol{ALLOWED_PROVIDER_VM_TYPES}[_{p,cEM}]}}\glssymbol{use}[_{cEM,vm}] - 1 \le \glssymbol{component_max_instances}[_{cEM}] \cdot \sum_{ {vm \in \glssymbol{ALLOWED_PROVIDER_VM_TYPES}[_{p,cLB}]}}\glssymbol{use}[_{cLB,vm}] \\
\label{constraint:minimal_throughput}    \sum_{ {vm \in \glssymbol{ALLOWED_VM_TYPES}[_{cW}]}}\glssymbol{use}[_{cW,vm}] \cdot \glssymbol{throughput}[_{vm}] \ge \glssymbol{min_throughput} \\
\label{constraint:maximal_cost}    \glssymbol{incured_cost} + \sum_{ {c \in \glssymbol{COMPONENTS}}\atop {{vm \in \glssymbol{ALLOWED_VM_TYPES}[_{c}]}}}\glssymbol{vm_price}[_{vm}] \cdot \glssymbol{use}[_{c,vm}] \cdot \frac{\glssymbol{simulations_to_go}}{\sum_{ {vm \in \glssymbol{ALLOWED_VM_TYPES}[_{cW}]}}\glssymbol{use}[_{cW,vm}] \cdot \glssymbol{throughput}[_{vm}]} \le \glssymbol{max_cost}
